CommandDefinition.Name: registerdatamodeltype
CommandDefinition.Description: Registers an additional data model type implementation.

Argument.Name: name
Argument.Description: The name of the data model type implementation. There must exist a corresponding subdirectory with the same name under server/datamodeltypes/ containing the jar-file(s) of the data model type implementation.

Argument.Name: fqClassName
Argument.Description: The fully qualified name of the class implementing the DataModelType interface.
